comment: Even the second dose could take upto weeks to fully activate the immunisation depending on the type of covid vaccine. Also there is no guarantee against covid even if you had your vaccine. But its expected to be a bit mild because of the immunity developed.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / possible-01
            :ARG1 (t / take-10
                  :ARG0 (a / activate-01
                        :ARG0 (d / dose
                              :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                                    :value 2)
                              :mod (e / even))
                        :ARG1 (ii / immunize-01)
                        :degree (f / full))
                  :ARG1 (u / up-to
                        :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                              :quant 1
                              :unit (w / week)))
                  :ARG0-of (d2 / depend-01
                        :ARG1 (v / vaccine
                              :mod (p2 / product
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Covid"))
                              :mod (t3 / type)))))
      :snt2 (g / guarantee-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (v2 / vaccinate-01
                  :ARG1 (y / you))
            :mod (a2 / also)

                  :op1 (h / have-03

                        :ARG1 (v3 / vaccine
                              :poss y))))
      :snt3 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (e3 / expect-01
                  :ARG1 (m2 / mild
                        :degree (b / bit)
                        :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                              :ARG0 (d3 / develop-02
                                    :ARG1 (ii2 / immune-02)))))))
